name: We're All Gonna Die Anyway
description:
A 2D mini life simulator where you play as a monster.

Hello! 

First of all, thank you for downloading our game “We're All Gonna Die Anyway”!

We are students from CIIT College of Arts and Technology and we would like to ask you if it's okay to answer our survey regarding your experience of our game. We will be using your answers to improve our game’s  UX, understandability, difficulty tuning, and more.

SURVEY LINK:  https://forms.gle/pa9QdNHYmr8Q12h79

This was developed as a requirement for our Capstone Project. 

Special thanks to the following for their awesome art:

  • LimeZu - modern interior tile set
  • Adam Saltsman - Azul (Tile set)
